stories.title: Create API package structure
stories.intent: Establish the API layer foundation with router, middleware, and handler patterns
acceptance: core/api/ directory exists with router.go, middleware.go, handlers/ subdirectory
Chi or Gin router configured with JSON middleware
Health check endpoint at GET /api/health returns 200

stories.title: Implement phases API
stories.intent: Expose phase data with progress statistics for dashboard
acceptance: Each phase includes: id, name, status, story count, merged count, progress percentage

stories.title: Implement epics API

acceptance: Each epic includes: id, phase_id, name, story count, merged count, progress percentage

stories.title: Implement stories API

acceptance: Each story includes: id, title, status, phase, epic, depends_on count

stories.title: Implement story detail API
stories.intent: Expose full story details including dependencies
acceptance: Includes: id, title, intent, acceptance criteria array, depends_on array, dependents array
Includes: status, passes, merged, merge_commit, pr_url, branch

stories.title: Implement activity API
stories.intent: Expose activity logs with date range filtering
acceptance: Each entry includes: timestamp, action, message, story_ref

stories.title: Implement learnings API
stories.intent: Expose learnings with search and tag filtering
acceptance: Each entry includes: id, title, content, tags array, created_at

stories.title: Implement metrics API
stories.intent: Expose token usage and timing statistics

stories.title: Implement versions API

acceptance: Each version includes: name, total stories, merged count, percentage complete

stories.intent: Expose current agent state for dashboard
